roleset.name: (cause to) calm down
roleset.note: TRANQUILIZE-V NOTES: Frame file created by Arrick. Member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from tranquilize.01-v)

example.name: at peace
example.text: Nothing contributes so much *PRO* to tranquilize the mind as a steady purpose.

example.name: adjectival
example.text: During critical moments of anxiety and emotional unsteadiness, it can often exert a tranquilizing force, * holding onto a person so that he does n't fall down.
